item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“OmidSan, post:17, topic:189286”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=252156.msg2112489#msg2112489 date=1205654264]

I always sell the barrows item after I get it. But the common misconception of those who do barrows, is that the runes are the most important reward from the barrows. Unless you get a guthan spear, the runes generally give you more money than the barrows items do (unless you get lucky).

yeah you’re probably right. But how much do G-Spears cost? Around 5m?

Not sure, but probably 3.5-4.5m
[/quote]
Oh, that’s still a lot, whats so great about it.[/quote]

  1. guthans is teh sex
  2. you barely need any effort to get it

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Martin, post:33, topic:189286”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=252156.msg2113977#msg2113977 date=1205705779]

This bug was proved to be entirely useless.

I seriously doubt that. You could use that to go into like barbarian outpost get like 50k runes and force tele out of it so you keep all of the runes.

you do not understand the glitch -.-

Then explain how it’s fun please =]

No you need to understand that 99% of runescape is Area based. Duel arena was part of that 1% that was not area based until they updated. The coolest thing about it is that jagex can update their game without having to shut down the server. Because 1 minute it worked the next it did not. And as for barbarian assault the second you leave since it is area based the runes disappear. That is because if your not in the area of barbarian assault it knows you should not have them. And the runes have a different id.
[/quote]

You do not know the rest of the glitch then. When you FT out an interface must pop up to delay the disappearing of the runes. Then drop them. :P[/quote]

not really
because the more you have the faster they dissapear… I tried it with 2k bloods and i tried it with 100 bloods… I got the 100 but not the 2k -.-

Read full topic

And the runes have a different id.
[/quote]

You do not know the rest of the glitch then. When you FT out an interface must pop up to delay the disappearing of the runes. Then drop them. :P[/quote]

Uh… Something about delaying runes and they come…:S i’ll just stop there. This is too confusing for me lol

[quote=“billygotshot, post:30, topic:189286”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=252156.msg2113973#msg2113973 date=1205705584]

you do not understand the glitch -.-

Then explain how it’s fun please =]

No you need to understand that 99% of runescape is Area based. Duel arena was part of that 1% that was not area based until they updated. The coolest thing about it is that jagex can update their game without having to shut down the server. Because 1 minute it worked the next it did not. And as for barbarian assault the second you leave since it is area based the runes disappear. That is because if your not in the area of barbarian assault it knows you should not have them. [quote=“OmidSan, post:29, topic:189286”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=252156.msg2113958#msg2113958 date=1205705017]

you do not understand the glitch -.-
[/quote]
Then explain how it’s fun please =][/quote]

No you need to understand that 99% of runescape is Area based. Duel arena was part of that 1% that was not area based until they updated. The coolest thing about it is that jagex can update their game without having to shut down the server. Because 1 minute it worked the next it did not. And as for barbarian assault the second you leave since it is area based the runes disappear. That is because if your not in the area of barbarian assault it knows you should not have them. And the runes have a different id.

item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I finally got the portal thing to work, took forever. Went to Bounty Hunter, clicked my ‘music’ interface, which I had chosen after collecting quite a bit of runes and arrows, and found that it does not work. Took me an hour to get that glitch to work too.

item.title: Barrows
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“gsheni, post:15, topic:189286”]I found this excerpt from Archive of Sythe.org

Zect
05-12-2007, 09:41 PM
HOW TO DO IT:

The way it works is first you go to enter your house (NOT with the house teleport).
When you click to go in you must quickly click on an interface (I prefer a skill interface).
That will stop you from going into the house.
Now you can walk around and when you click to walk on the mini map you should quickly click on the skill interface again.
So now you can walk around and then if you close the interface you go into your house.
So you can enter your house from anywhere.

NOTE:

  • Try to use laggy world (2, 6, 9, 12, 18…) to make this working better.
  • When you leave the house you appear back where you were before you closed the interface. (Unless you use teleport.)
    say ty

Is that what is. I used google to find this. ;D
How the heck did you make money off it[/quote]

no although i did abuse this in a different way but it lead to no where.

Read full topic

item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

bootnecklad:

Start now because you could get it all done by end of monday!

Get what all done? [quote=“billygotshot, post:13, topic:189286”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=252156.msg2111001#msg2111001 date=1205619982]

I got loads of stuff from barrows,but never a guthans spear. I do about two-three rounds every bank trip and have done well over one hundred trips. I probably made around 8m from that.

on my banned account dh713 i did roughly 250 or so trips to barrows without anything… I blew 20m of my friends money doing this. Then i got onto my friends account and i got a spear on the 3rd trip.

Lmfao. How did u get bann3d
[/quote]

remember that force telly glitch tainted ones released? well me and my friend just used it to make some cash and we got banned after a week.[/quote]never heard of that
